snippet.title: Separation | Launch Trailer | Recluse Industries
snippet.description:
This is the launch trailer for virtual-reality ambient adventure game Separation.

Separation is developed by Recluse Industries and is out today exclusively for PlayStation VR.

Martin Wheeler is the one-man-team at Recluse Industries and produces music as Vector Lovers.

Recluse Industries:
Website | https://recluseindustries.com/
Twitter | https://twitter.com/recluseindie

#Separation #RecluseIndustries #VirtualReality

----------
